rows.label: tlk400701_msg0001
rows.name: Ah, Rex. You came.

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0002
rows.name: Yeah...

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0003
rows.name: Don't look so down.

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0050
rows.name:
The Boss left me a message for
you. He said to give it to you if
anything ever happened to him.

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0004
rows.name:
A message from Vandham-san for me!?
Don't tell me he had a feeling...

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0005
rows.name: Maybe, but I don't think so.

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0006
rows.name:
Being a mercenary means you never
know when or where you'll die.

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0007
rows.name:
So you leave messages with people
you trust before you head out,
so you don't have regrets.

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0009
rows.name: Listen closely...

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0010
rows.name:
"Rex... I'm entrusting this
mercenary band to you."

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0013
rows.name: Um... is there anything else?

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0014
rows.name: That's it.

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0015
rows.name:
What!? Entrusting it to me?
You've got to be joking!

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0016
rows.name:
It's no joke. It's a
straightforward message, just
like the Boss himself, isn't it?

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0017
rows.name:
It's straightforward,
but... Why would he entrust
it to someone like me?

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0018
rows.name:
The Boss liked you, Rex. And everyone
else in this band likes you too.

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0019
rows.name:
You're not just honest, you have
resolve. And you give us hope...

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0020
rows.name: But that's not just my own strength...

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0021
rows.name:
That's true... But there's
something about you that gives
people hope. Everyone thinks so.

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0022
rows.name:
Rex... Will you carry
on the Boss's will?

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0023
rows.name: Take over the Hr√¶svelgr Mercenaries?

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0024
rows.name: I'll do it.

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0025
rows.name: I can't.

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0026
rows.name: ...Alright. I'll do it!

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0027
rows.name:
Alright! Well said! That's the
man the Boss believed in!

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0028
rows.name:
But what exactly does
a mercenary band do?

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0051
rows.name:
There aren't any other messages
from Vandham-san, are there?

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0029
rows.name: Just that one line.

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0030
rows.name: But of course, I and Zuo will help you.

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0031
rows.name:
Running a mercenary band all of a
sudden would be a heavy burden.

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0032
rows.name:
You just need to give the
general orders, Rex. We'll
handle the details.

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0033
rows.name:
We'll hand things over
to you gradually.

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0034
rows.name: I see. I think I can manage that.

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0035
rows.name:
Alright! First, an explanation
of the mercenary band.

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0036
rows.name:
Our band takes on various
missions from all across
the different nations.

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0037
rows.name:
Escort, subjugation, gathering
supplies... And there are some
truly trivial missions too.

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0038
rows.name:
By the way, Rex... don't
you have more Blades than
you know what to do with?

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0039
rows.name:
If you have any idle
Blades, you can accept
missions and dispatch them.

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0040
rows.name:
That way, the Blades gain
experience, and you get a reward.

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0041
rows.name:
It's better to do it than talk
about it. First, choose a mission,
accept it, and then complete it.

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0042
rows.name: Rex...

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0043
rows.name:
What were the Boss's
final moments like?

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0044
rows.name: You were the only ones who saw it...

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0045
rows.name: Me and Zuo have no way of knowing...

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0046
rows.name:
What was the Boss thinking...
why did he sacrifice his life?

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0047
rows.name:
Wasn't it because he found
something worth paying for
with his own life...?

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0048
rows.name: Think carefully about that...
